thread.title: Employer Relations Manager - College Sports

title: Employer Relations Manager - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Employer Relations Manager Posted/Updated: 10-14-2015 Brief Job Description: Lead the development and execution of on and off campus employer recruiting efforts for the career development program through initiation, development and management of corporate and other...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
